name: Petits cubes
description:
A game made for the trijam #165 

The theme was : one action at a time !

So the game is pretty simple. You have 5 Actions: Up / left / down / right and shoot.  And you have to press one key at the good moment to make an action.

I loved to work on that theme. Hope you'll enjoy it !

Game design / Art / Programming:  RM
